short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for checking whether a website is built with Shopify or not

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A free extension to detect if an online is built on Shopify on now.

The Shopify Checker by EcomSutra lets to determine if a website ( entered URL) is built with Shopify on not. This extension will be useful for beginners who want to determine if a store is on Shopify.
